articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets mostly fall on penultimate day of the year - CNBC
articles.description: Investors will be focused on China's military exercises around Taiwan today, after it announced new drills surrounding the island Monday.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets mostly fell Tuesday, after the tech sell-down on Wall Street continued on AI bubble fears.
Nvidia shares dropped more than 1% Monday stateside, giving back some of its more than… [+1752 chars]
